title: Shark Pinball
description:
Get ready for Shark Pinball , a pinball machine where you’ll try to score points avoiding Sharks, octopus and many other perils, show everybody that you’re not afraid of the sea monsters on this table. Discover all the missions and secrets, in this unique pinball arcade machine with two floors.
Complete all the missions and become number 1 in the world or the best among your Friends, posting your high score on the online leaderboard. Only Up!

system_requirements.Processor: Intel Core 2 DUO 2.4 GHz / AMD Athlon X2 2.7 GHz
system_requirements.Graphics: Nvidia GTX 650 Ti or AMD HD 7850
